tags: Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) spare parts
full_summary:
================
### Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) Spare Parts Notice

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (Demande de propositions)**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015740
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-238941/A
**Publication Date:** 2022-12-02
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-14T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for spare parts for the Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW). The tender notice has undergone several amendments to clarify requirements and answer industry questions.

**Description of Requirement**
----------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply of spare parts for the HLVW. The parts to be supplied are:

1. Gasket, NSN 21-913-4781, 150 units x Each, delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal
2. Gasket, NSN 21-913-4781, 30 units x Each, delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton
3. Connecting Link, NSN 20-013-8862, 15 units x Each, delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal
4. Connecting Link, NSN 20-013-8862, 10 units x Each, delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton

... ( remaining items )

**Bidder Requirements**
---------------------
Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, or part number and NCAGE. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.

**Electronic Submission of Bids**
------------------------------

For details on submitting bids via email, refer to the "Electronic Submission of Bids" section in the solicitation document. Bids must be submitted by email only to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Pyen, Yewon
yewon.pyeon@forces.gc.ca
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

**Attachments**
--------------

Attachments for this tender notice are available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/c9bff5df869e01f117f3bc22b6c16784/w8486-238941-hlvw-spares-amendment_002_bilingual.pdf).
